result.execSummary:
All charges against Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Criminal Damage to Property (Less Than $2,500 Damage)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver

records.addlTxt: by Attorney Copeland, filed.

Defendant Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver in court with attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 07-13-2022, filed.

Defendant Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver in court with attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Final pre-trial held. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for a jury trial on 7/13/22 at 8:30 am in Branch 29.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 06-24-2022, filed.

Defendant Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver in court with attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a motion to withdraw hearing.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defense counsel withdraws his motion to withdraw. Case remains calendared as previously set in Branch 29.  This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da

to withdraw as counsel, filed.

Defendant Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver in court with attorney Jade Hall for Brett Lee Copeland.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 03-10-2022, filed.
received and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for LEVEL 3 SUPERVISION.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with RDG.  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver in court with attorney Jade K Hall.  Defendant Dionte Duwond-Deon Oliver in custody.  Karen Lynch Vespalec appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: STW
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM AND LIVE STREAM ON DA CAST.   Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.   The case is adjourned to Br. 29 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
